Alias.name: Practice Weaves
Alias.script: if weave_trainer:pracs_to_level() > 51 then weave_trainer:echo( "More than 51 levels required. Cannot practice this practice setup.\n", false, true ) else for k, v in pairs(weave_trainer.pracs.elements) do for i = 1, weave_trainer.elements.pracs[v], 1 do send("practice " .. v) end end for k, v in pairs(weave_trainer.pracs.weaves) do for i = 1, weave_trainer.weaves.pracs[v], 1 do send("practice " .. v) end end end
